description.en_US: Shoot a single enemy to hex them with a lingering explosion. Nearby enemies take collateral damage.
Throw two volleys of unenchanted spell cards.
Hit an enemy to summon a swarm of bees.
Throw spell cards which pierce enemies before homing in on nearby targets.
Summon a cluster of explosions in front of you, damaging any enemies caught within.
Strike a single enemy with a lingering curse that will continue dealing damage over time. Stackable.
Draw enemies inward towards a single point before blasting them with a powerful explosion.
Hit a single enemy to deal moderate damage and severely lower their attack stat by \c[1]-50%\c[0]. It will recover after a short time. You have brief invincibility during the initial attack.
Dash through enemies, tagging them with explosive spell cards as you make contact.
Dash and leave behind a mine that will deploy after a brief arming period. Enemies that trigger it will be launched far in the direction the mine was facing.
Hit a single enemy to barrage them with explosive spell cards and follow up with a melee attack.
A sturdy shield that grants a sustained perfect guard window to parry all incoming attacks. Also serves as a basic melee attack.
Creates a shield that resists \c[3]20%\c[0] of all damage and provides knockback resistance for a brief time. Inflicts a \c[1]-7.5%\c[0] movement speed penalty while active.
Not yet implemented!
Shoot a barrage of homing fireballs in a wide arc.
Hit a single enemy to trigger a burst of seeking fireballs.
Hit enemies with a quick spin attack to cause them to ignite for a short time.
Summon a meteor strike to deal massive damage in a small area.
A steerable spin attack followed by a final hit that inflicts a delayed explosion on enemies.
Summon multiple meteors to barrage an area in front of you, dealing massive damage.
Call down a huge meteor storm, bombarding the area in front of you before crashing down with a massive asteroid.
Charge forward and hit an enemy with an explosive tackle, followed by a small burst of fireballs.
Dash and leave behind a spell card which will explode shortly after.
Charge into a single enemy with a huge explosion followed up by a stream of fireballs.
Summon a swirling fire vortex at the dash start position. Enemies hit during the dash will be knocked backwards.
Not yet implemented!
Power up your next standard melee attack. Charges to a more powerful stage if you wait before consuming it.
Upgrades your standard ranged attacks for a brief time.

Call upon dark magic to enhance your agility and replace your standard melee and dash attacks with powerful alternatives. \c[3]Firebrand\c[0] and \c[3]Augmented Flames\c[0] will not work normally while active.
Shoot a row of hail spikes that aim at nearby targets.
Shoot a slow-moving spell card that pierces enemies and bounces off walls.
Shoot a more powerful row of hail spears that pierce multiple enemies.
Shoot slow-moving snowstorm that damages enemies as it travels before exploding.
Throw an explosive ice spell that drags enemies along and creates a path of hail spears as it travels.
Attack with a rapid flurry of short-ranged slashes.
A sweeping ice attack. If an enemy is hit, follow up with a combo.
Hit multiple enemies with a wide sweep and follow up with an explosive volley.
Dash forward and expel an icy blast behind you.
A spinning dash attack followed by a double blast of icy wind.
Cast a protective barrier of ice spikes that deal contact damage and block light projectiles. Any remaining ice will shoot ourwards when the barrier expires.
Deal out a cluster of lingering icicle spell cards that impale any enemy that comes in contact with them.
Knock back enemies with a series of spin attacks, summoning sturdy hail barriers in the process. Barriers will block projectiles and deal contact damage.
Call down two rotating laser beams that devastate an area around where they were cast.
Summon powerful gusts of swirling snowflakes which shoot at nearby enemies.
Hit an enemy with a powerful lightning bolt that has moderately high knockback.
Hit multiple enemies in front of you with a fast spell card that returns after being thrown.
Shoot an electrified spell card which does heavy damage to a single enemy on hit.
Aim and throw barrages of piercing spell cards.
Before shooting the spell, it must be aimed manually as it charges. It will rotate along with your own aiming scope. Hits a single enemy with powerful lightning.
Stun and damage enemies in a small area in front of you before knocking them away with a lightning bolt.

Hit an enemy with a hex that causes minor lightning strikes and slows the target's time flow by \c[3]-15%\c[0] for a short time. Only one Throttle Hex can be active at a time. Stacks with the Chill status.
Stun and damage enemies in a large area in front of you.

Hit a single enemy to freeze them in time. Grants \c[3]+150%\c[0] DEF to enemy while active and does not deal any damage. Has its own cooldown, during which this art will backfire and become \c[3]Throttle Hex\c[0].
Freeze enemies in a big area in front of you and trap them in a big lightning storm.
Dash and leave behind a spell card which will return to you after a delay, damaging enemies as it travels.
An intangible dash ending in a lightning strike. Weak as an attack but useful for dodging. Deals \c[1]-5%\c[0] of your total HP in self-damage.
Dash three times to leave behind magnet cards. They will connect a beam between enemies and yourself, damaging all enemies caught in the middle.
Dash forward and end in a melee attack. Powerful lightning will strike along your path.
Dash and summon a much more powerful magnet card. It will damage all enemies on its path to reach you; run away to extend the duration.
Dash forward to stun enemies before hitting a target with a concentrated lightning strike. Move around while charging to aim the target.
Activate an electrifying aura, spawning two orbiting shock orbs that damage enemies.
Cloak yourself in an explosive electric charge. It will detonate upon touching an enemy, dealing huge damage and knockback.
Shoot a powerful laser that pierces enemies.
Hit an enemy to absorb HP.
Fire a more powerful laser and leave a lingering sentry card which continues to fire at enemies.
Hit a single enemy to heal \c[2]+5%\c[0] of your HP plus additional absorbtion from the enemy.
Cast a devastating laser that carves a wide path of desctruction in a straight line.
Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying.
description.de_DE: Starker Frontalangriff, der alle getroffenen Feinde weit wegstt.

description.en_US: A quick flurry to draw in enemies followed by a powerful blast.
Leave behind a mire that damages and slows enemies.
Dash forward and perform a spin attack, leaving behind a decoy that attacks as well.
A dash attack that leaves behind a large temporal field. While inside, enemies will have their timeflow reduced while the user and their allies will have theirs increased.
Perform two dash attacks which will be repeated by cosmic clones.
Charge up before aiming a dash attack. If an enemy is hit, perform a devastating attack.

Place a recall point on first use. On subsequent uses, place a new recall point and teleport back to your previous one, causing an explosion upon arrival and dealing \c[1]-5%\c[0] of your total HP in self-damage.

Deal a healing card which will replenish up to \c[2]+25%\c[0] of your HP over \c[2]15\c[0] ticks. Repeated uses have a chance to reduce the total ticks (resets on map exit). The card is fragile and will break with enemy attacks.
Place a trap card which explodes on enemy contact. If \c[3]Wave Recall\c[0] is active, detonate the recall card for a more powerful explosion which draws in enemies.
Enter an ethereal state to recover \c[2]+20%\c[0] of your HP and heal status conditions. This process will leave you \c[1]slowed\c[0] for a period afterwards.
Summons a powerful aura that periodically explodes around the caster.
